title: On my 7th replacement for my pixel 2 xl. - 8th one is the charm, worst warranty replacement program.
content:
LCD has a small green dot on the left center. 

This is a brand new replacement not a refurbished. This is my 7th replacement. 

Help me. I just want a working phone. I lost all trust. Should have never got this phone after Nexus 6p brick you guys did.
